flavorText: Awylla's salvaged dreams would finally be put to good use.

foreignData.flavorText: Awyllas geborgene Träume wurden endlich einem guten Nutzen zugeführt.
foreignData.name: Traumdieb
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Traumdieb ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte, falls du in diesem Zug einen anderen blauen Zauberspruch gespielt hast.

foreignData.flavorText: Finalmente los restos de los sueños de Awylla sirvieron para algo.
foreignData.name: Ladrona de sueños
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Cuando la Ladrona de sueños entre en juego, roba una carta si jugaste otro hechizo azul este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Les rêves d'Awylla allaient enfin se révéler utiles.
foreignData.name: Voleuse de rêves
foreignData.text:
Vol
Quand la Voleuse de rêves arrive en jeu, piochez une carte si vous avez joué un autre sort bleu ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: Dei sogni riciclati di Awylla verrebbe finalmente fatto un buon uso.
foreignData.name: Ladra di Sogni
foreignData.text:
Volare
Quando la Ladra di Sogni entra in gioco, pesca una carta se hai giocato un'altra magia blu in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 掬い出されたアウィラの夢でも、そのうちいい使い道が見つかるだろう。
foreignData.name: 夢の盗人
foreignData.text:
飛行
夢の盗人が場に出たとき、あなたがこのターンに他の青の呪文をプレイしていた場合、カードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — フェアリー・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: Os sonhos resgatados de Awylla finalmente serviriam para alguma coisa.
foreignData.name: Ladra de Sonho
foreignData.text:
Voar
Quando Ladra de Sonho entrar em jogo, compre um card se tiver jogado outra mágica azul neste turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Наконец-то спасенным снам Авиллы найдется достойное применение.
foreignData.name: Похитительница Снов
foreignData.text:
Полет
Когда Похитительница Снов входит в игру, возьмите карту, если вы разыграли другое синее заклинание в этом ходу.

foreignData.flavorText: 艾薇拉被回收的眠梦终将有好用处。
foreignData.name: 眠梦窃贼
foreignData.text:
飞行
当眠梦窃贼进场时，如果你本回合中使用过其他蓝色咒语，则抓一张牌。

name: Dream Thief
originalText:
Flying
When Dream Thief comes into play, draw a card if you played another blue spell this turn.

rulings.text: Dream Thief doesn’t check whether you’ve cast another blue spell until its enters-the-battlefield ability resolves. If Dream Thief’s enters-the-battlefield ability triggers, then you cast a blue instant spell in response, you’ll get the bonus.

Although Dream Thief says it looks for “another blue spell,” there’s no requirement that Dream Thief actually be cast as a spell (or be blue) for this part of its ability to work. For example, if a spell such as Zombify puts Dream Thief directly onto the battlefield, its ability will still check whether you’ve cast a blue spell this turn, even though you didn’t cast Dream Thief itself as a spell.

text:
Flying
When Dream Thief enters the battlefield, draw a card if you've cast another blue spell this turn.
